post.author: bashport
post.body:
two objects with the glass shader in a row. you look through one, you don't see the other...
is it possible to render both?

also the glass is always lit, even with no light source exisent - because of the reflection?
can this be altered to receive light/shadow?

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: D3 only does 1 single reflection to avoid infinite reflections (would prefer if it was more, like 3 or 4). I think Prey allows multiple reflections.
